mobiles.name: locust
mobiles.long_description: A giant locust is here, devouring sinners.
mobiles.description:
The locust is man sized, with the face of man and
the hair of a woman. It bears its lion teeth and beats
his breastplate of iron with its wings. Its long body
ends in a scorpion stinger.

mobiles.name: abaddon king angel
mobiles.long_description: The angel of the bottomless pit is here, bound in a chain.
mobiles.description:
Abaddon pleads with you to release him from his binding.
He claims the chain is the source of all his suffering.
He promises you great power and position in the world to
come. His appearance is to your liking, whatever that may be,
and you find his voice pleasant and reasonable.

mobiles.name: babylon whore woman harlot
mobiles.long_description: A woman arrayed in purple and scarlet beckons to you!
mobiles.description:
The woman is decked in gold, precious stones, and pearls.
Upon her forehead is written:
MYSTERY BABYLON THE GREAT. THE MOTHER
OF HARLOTS AND ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH.

mobiles.name: angel water waters
mobiles.long_description: An angel is here, holding down the watery corner of the world.
mobiles.description:
The angel looks you over and tells you that you are too late.
He has already cast the second vial of wrath into the sea.

mobiles.name: angel earth
mobiles.long_description: An angel is here, shaking the earthen corner of the world!
mobiles.description:
The angel looks you over and tells you that you are too late.
The 6th seal already has been broken.

mobiles.name: angel air
mobiles.long_description: An angel is here, holding down the airy corner of the world.
mobiles.description:
The angel looks you over and tells you that you are too late.
He has already scattered the seventh vial of wrath on the wind.

mobiles.name: angel fire
mobiles.short_description: The angel with the fiery censer
mobiles.long_description: An angel is here, containing the fiery corner of the world.
mobiles.description:
The angel looks you over and tells you that you are too late.
He has already poured the fourth vial of wrath upon the sun.

mobiles.name: angel harvesting
mobiles.long_description: An angel is here, harvesting sinners with his sickle.
mobiles.description: The angel has no mercy for those without seals.

mobiles.name: army heaven
mobiles.long_description: An army of heaven is here, laying waste to sinners.
mobiles.description:
The army of heaven is approximately 50 troops, lightly
armed with simple spears and shields.

mobiles.name: horseman white
mobiles.long_description: A rider mounted on a white horse conquers all in sight!
mobiles.description:
The rider is mounted on a lion headed horse, which breathes
fire, smoke and brimstone as it rears.

mobiles.name: horseman red
mobiles.long_description: A rider mounted on a red horse wages war here.
mobiles.description:
The rider is mounted on a lion headed horse, which breathes
fire, smoke and brimstone as it rears.

mobiles.name: horseman black
mobiles.long_description: A rider mounted on a black horse rampages here!
mobiles.description:
The rider is mounted on a lion headed horse, which breathes
fire, smoke and brimstone as it rears.

mobiles.name: horseman pale
mobiles.long_description: A rider mounted on a pale horse leaves death in his wake.
mobiles.description:
The rider is mounted on a lion headed horse, which breathes
fire, smoke and brimstone as it rears.

mobiles.name: michael archangel
mobiles.long_description: Michael, Archangel of war is here, fighting the dragon.
mobiles.description:
Michael towers some 18', and is dressed in the blinding
white of heaven. His voice booms in a deep base laugh.

mobiles.name: dragon
mobiles.long_description: A great, 7 headed dragon is here, fighting Michael.
mobiles.description:
The dragon has seven heads and ten horns. Upon the
ten horns are ten crowns, and upon the 7 heads are
blasphemy.

mobiles.name: jezebel woman
mobiles.long_description: A woman is here encouraging everyone to fornicate!
mobiles.description:
Jezebel the prophetess is a firm believier in fornication
and the eating of food sacrificed to idols. She will 
gladly try to sway you to her point of view.

mobiles.name: Balaam teacher man
mobiles.long_description: A man is here teaching all to eat idol sacrifices!
mobiles.description:
Balaam, teacher of Balac is engrossed in his discourse
on the merits of eating food sacrificed to idols. His
rapt audience pays you no heed.

mobiles.name: balac disciple man
mobiles.long_description: A man casts a stumbling block to the children of Isreal!
mobiles.description:
Balac, disciple of Balaam looks at you then begins a
fanatical speech on how life has no meaning unless you
fornicate freely and eat sacrificed food.

mobiles.name: spirit unclean frog
mobiles.long_description: A spirit like a frog howls here.
mobiles.description:
The unclean spirit came from the mouth of
the dragon, and is really a devil. It
performs a series of miracles to impress you
with its power and sway you to fight on the 
side of the dragon.

mobiles.name: prophet false
mobiles.long_description: A smoke-breathing man with rams horns shouts here!
mobiles.description:
The false prophet is the spokesman for the beast.
He does great wonders, such as summoning fire from
heaven to gather worshippers for the beast. He seems
set on getting those around him to make an image to 
the beast, which he promises to give life to and 
order it to kill all those who do not worship the image.
If you will worship as he says, step forward and
receive the mark.

mobiles.name: woman sun
mobiles.short_description: The woman clothed with the sun
mobiles.long_description: A woman clothed with the sun flys here.
mobiles.description:
The woman is clothed with the sun, has
the moon under her feet. She is beautiful
to behold. She tells you to run, for a
great dragon is hunting her.

mobiles.name: word god
mobiles.long_description: The word of God is here uniting all nations.
mobiles.description:
The word of God rides upon a white horse. His
eyes are flames of fire, and on his head is
a white crown. He is clothed in a vesture dipped
in blood, and he treadeth the winepress and 
fierceness and wrath of Almighty God. On his 
thigh is written King of Kings and Lord of Lords.

mobiles.name: one sealed
mobiles.long_description: A sealed one is here, singing a hymn of praise.
mobiles.description:
The sealed one is one of the 12 tribes of Isreal.
All of the tribes were marked with a seal so as
to spare them from the wrath of God.

mobiles.name: one marked
mobiles.long_description: A marked one is here, preparing for the final battle.
mobiles.description:
The marked one has chosen the side of evil for
the final conflict. He seems to be suffering from a pox.

mobiles.name: beast
mobiles.long_description: The seven headed, ten horned beast is here.
mobiles.description:
The beast has seven heads, ten horns. Upon the ten 
horns are ten crowns. It is like a leopard with
feet like a bear and the mouth of a lion. A huge
scar runs across one head, where it was mortally
wounded and healed.

mobiles.name: idolator man
mobiles.long_description: A man is here worshipping an idol.
mobiles.description:
The idolator is engrossed in his worship, and
does not see you.

mobiles.name: whoremonger man
mobiles.long_description: A man is here, buying the services of a prostitute.
mobiles.description:
The whoremonger has chosen a paticularly sleezy 
woman, who probably is infected.

mobiles.name: murderer
mobiles.long_description: A murderer is here to slit your throat.
mobiles.description:
You have evaded the murder's notice. He
is dressed in rags and carries a bloody 
knife.

mobiles.name: harlot woman
mobiles.long_description: A woman is here, peddling her body.
mobiles.description:
The harlot winks at you from her pasty
animal greased complexion. She wiggles
her hips suggestively. She smells nice,
having bathed in the last week.

mobiles.name: thief
mobiles.long_description: A thief is here, robbing you blind.
mobiles.description:
The thief bumps into you. You drop
your purse. He picks it up and returns
it to you.

mobiles.name: man rich
mobiles.long_description: A rich man is here, fleeing divine wrath.
mobiles.description:
The rich man is moving slowly, as he is
carrying alot of gawdy babbles. He blames
his sins on the greedy poor.

mobiles.name: man mighty
mobiles.long_description: A mighty man is here, fleeing divine wrath.
mobiles.description:
The man you vaguely recall as being involved
in politics somehow. He is in rags now, and
has a harried look. He blames his sins on
his rivals.

mobiles.name: king
mobiles.long_description: A former king is here, fleeing divine wrath.
mobiles.description:
The former king is dressed in rags. He clutches
fiercly to his crown, the last symbol of his
authority. You notice most of the stones in the
crown are missing. He blames his sins on his
corrupt ministers who ruined the kingdom.

mobiles.name: bondsman
mobiles.long_description: A bondsman is here, fleeing divine wrath.
mobiles.description:
The bondsman has somehow escaped his master.
He blames all his sins on his master.

mobiles.name: freeman
mobiles.long_description: A freeman is here, fleeing divine wrath.
mobiles.description:
The freeman is empoverished. He blames
all of his sins on the guild.

mobiles.name: captain chief
mobiles.long_description: A former captain is here, fleeing divine wrath.
mobiles.description:
The chief captain is in rags. He blames his sins
on the king, who ordered him to commit atrocities.

mobiles.name: he sits
mobiles.short_description: He who sits at the throne
mobiles.long_description: He who sits says "I am the alpha and the omega".
mobiles.description:
He is like jasper and carnelian. You better do as
he says.

mobiles.name: lamb
mobiles.long_description: A Lamb as it had been slain stands here.
mobiles.description: The lamb has seven horns and seven eyes.

mobiles.name: elders four twenty
mobiles.long_description: Four and twenty elders sit at four and twenty thrones.
mobiles.description:
The elders are in white robes with golden crowns. They
play harps, and swing golden bowls filled with incense.

mobiles.name: lion creature
mobiles.long_description: A lion creature sings, "Holy, Holy, Holy, The Lord..."
mobiles.description:
The lion creature is full of eyes in front and behind.
It has 6 wings, and even eyes inside.

mobiles.name: ox creature
mobiles.long_description: An ox creature sings, "Holy, Holy, Holy, The Lord..."
mobiles.description:
The ox creature is full of eyes in front and behind.
It has 6 wings, and eleven eyes inside.

mobiles.name: human face faced creature
mobiles.short_description: The creature with a human face
mobiles.long_description: A human faced creature sings, "Holy, Holy, Holy, The Lord..."
mobiles.description:
The human faced creature is full of eyes in front and behind.
It has 6 wings, and even eyes inside.

mobiles.name: eagle creature
mobiles.long_description: An eagle creature sings, "Holy, Holy, Holy, The Lord..."
mobiles.description:
The eagle creature is full of eyes in front and behind.
It has 6 wings, and even eyes inside.

objects.name: key david
objects.description: A key with a heavenly aura hums here.

objects.name: breastplate iron
objects.description: A huge, iron breastplate is here.

objects.name: sting locust
objects.description: A large barbed sting is here.

objects.name: chain binding
objects.description: A pretty silver chain lies here.

objects.name: cup babylon
objects.description: A golden cup filled with blood lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You look inside the cup and find it filled with
the blood of saints.

objects.name: girdle golden
objects.description: A golden girdle is here.

objects.name: sickle golden
objects.description: A golden sickle is here.

objects.name: saints prayers
objects.description: A vial humming with holiness lies here.

objects.name: censer
objects.description: A censer, smoking with incense burns here.

objects.name: crown white conquerer
objects.short_description: The white crown of the conquerer
objects.description: A white crown lies here.

objects.name: bow white conquerer
objects.short_description: The white bow of the conquerer
objects.description: A great white bow lies here.

objects.name: breastplate fire
objects.description: A breastplate of fire smoulders here.

objects.name: sword war
objects.description: A great two-handed sword lies here.

objects.name: breastplate jacinth
objects.description: A breastplate of jacinth glitters here.

objects.name: breastplate brimstone
objects.description: A breastplate of brimstone smokes here.

objects.name: balances pair
objects.description: A fine set of engraved balances lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The lettering says:
A measure of wheat for a penny, and three
measures of barley for a penny; and see
thou hurt not the oil and the wine.

objects.name: cloak death deaths death's
objects.description: A cloak, black as oblivion devours the light.

objects.name: scythe reaper grim
objects.short_description: The scythe of the Grim reaper
objects.description: An unholy scythe, devours the light here.

objects.name: lance holy archangel Michael
objects.short_description: The holy lance of archangel Michael
objects.description: A lance hums with a heavenly aura.

objects.name: mark beast
objects.description: A branded patch of skin lies on the ground.

extra_descriptions.description: The mark bears the number of his name: 666.

objects.name: wings eagles
objects.description: A giant pair of eagle wings lie here.

objects.name: crown stars twelve
objects.description: A crown with twelve stars lies here.

objects.name: clothing sun
objects.description: A shirt glowing like the sun lies here.

objects.name: clothing sun
objects.description: A skirt glowing like the sun lies here.

objects.name: moon
objects.description: A glowing piece of the moon is here.

objects.name: manna hidden
objects.description: A glowing circlet of hidden manna is here.

objects.name: rod iron
objects.description: A heavy rod of iron lies here.

objects.name: raiment white
objects.description: White raiment gleams brightly.

objects.name: stone white
objects.description: A white stone the size of a shield lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The stone says:
KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS

objects.name: sword mouth sharp two edged
objects.short_description: The sharp, two-edged sword of the mouth
objects.description: A huge two handed sword lies here.

objects.name: robe white
objects.description: A white robe lies here

objects.name: seal
objects.description: A seal lies here.

objects.name: star morning
objects.description: A fallen star glows as the morning.

objects.name: blood puddle
objects.description: A puddle of blood has collected here.

objects.name: blood fountain
objects.description: A fountain of blood gurgles here.

objects.name: throne emerald rainbow
objects.description: An emerald throne surrounded by a rainbow is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The throne flashes lightnings, and peals of thunder roll
from it.

objects.name: thrones four twenty
objects.description: Four and twenty thrones are here.

extra_descriptions.description: The thrones are made of gold and have a holy aura.

objects.name: scroll seven seals broken
objects.short_description: A scroll of seven broken seals
objects.description: A scroll of seven broken seals lies here, writing unseen.

extra_descriptions.description:
You carefully look at the writing on the scroll. It reads:

THOSE MORTALS ARE IN DEEP BLOOD LAKE NOW

objects.name: book
objects.description: A strange book with billions of names is here.

extra_descriptions.description: I bet mortals will drive themselves crazy about this one.

objects.name: bowl golden incense
objects.description: A golden bowl filled with incense smokes here.

rooms.name: At the corner of the world
rooms.description:
You smoulder in the flames of the corner of the world
devoted to fire. The vapors of your burning flesh reach your 
nose. Beyond the corner is only the blackness. There is
an unstoppered vial glowing orange red in the flames.

extra_descriptions.description: 4th vial of wrath: fire for blasphemers.

rooms.name: On the lake of fire
rooms.description:
You are upon a vast lake of fire burning with brimstone. About
you the wrath of God is visited upon the sinful.

rooms.name: On the lake of fire
rooms.description:
You are upon a vast lake of fire burning with brimstone. About
you the wrath of God is visited upon the sinful.

rooms.name: The plagued lands
rooms.description:
You walk through the wreteched, fetid wreak of the plagued lands.
Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.name: The plagued lands
rooms.description:
You walk through the wreteched, fetid wreak of the plagued lands.
Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view. Here the evil is so
strong you can almost feel it caress you. To the south lead a series of stairs
to a solid adamantite gate emblazoned with the seals of heaven.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.name: The many waters
rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.name: The many waters
rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.name: The many waters
rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.name: The corner of the world
rooms.description:
You are at the corner of the world, floating on a vast sea of blood.
An unstoppered vial floats in the water here. Beyond the corner is 
an endless stretch of empty black.

extra_descriptions.description: 2nd vial of wrath: Turning of the seas to blood.
You look at the vial. On the side are some strange runes.

rooms.name: On the lake of fire
rooms.description:
You are upon a vast lake of fire burning with brimstone. About
you the wrath of God is visited upon the sinful.

rooms.name: On the lake of fire
rooms.description:
You are upon a vast lake of fire burning with brimstone. About
you the wrath of God is visited upon the sinful.

rooms.name: The plagued lands
rooms.description:
You walk through the wreteched, fetid wreak of the plagued lands.
Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.description:

Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.description:

Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view. South of you
is the 'Synagogue of Satan' where people claiming to be Jews fornicate
and eat food sacrificed to idols.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view. A Nicolaitane walks
by- why dont you stone him?

rooms.name: The many waters
rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.name: The many waters
rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.description:

carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

you the wrath of God is visited upon the sinful.

Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.description:

Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.description:
You walk through the wreteched, fetid wreak of the plagued lands.
Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.description:

Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view. A lukewarm worshipper
is here to be spewed out of the mouth of the one to come.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are at the gates to Satan's city, MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view. Nobody seems
to mind the open gate.

rooms.name: MaGog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city of MaGog. About you writhe and covort sinners in
a final frolic before destruction.Refuse and ofcol are the perfume of the city. 
Deterioration and decay claim every building you view.

rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.description:

carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.name: The plagued lands
rooms.description:
You walk through the wreteched, fetid wreak of the plagued lands.
Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.name: The plagued lands
rooms.description:
You walk through the wreteched, fetid wreak of the plagued lands.
Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.name: The plagued lands
rooms.description:
You walk through the wreteched, fetid wreak of the plagued lands.
Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.description:

sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun

sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun

the moon flickers across the battlefield.

You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: The many waters
rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.name: The many waters
rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.name: The sunken volcano
rooms.description:
You arrive to heal the peal of the second horn, blown
by an angel flying above. You watch as the volcanic island
and all of its inhabitants sink into the many waters.
You are enveloped in clouds of blood steam.

rooms.name: The many waters
rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.name: The plagued lands
rooms.description:
You walk through the wreteched, fetid wreak of the plagued lands.
Once fine tall grass has withered into a lifeless desert. About you
flies lay eggs in the rotting flesh of the plagued.

rooms.name: The plagued lands
rooms.description:

rooms.name: The Euphrates
rooms.description:
You walk the bottom of the canyon where the Euphrates used to
flow. All that is left of the once mighty river are scattered red pools of 
blood. A terrible wind blows from down stream, bringing the smell
of death to your nose.

of death to your nose.

rooms.description:
You are on a vast sea of blood. Vultures soar in the red sky in search of 
carrion. Wreckage of many ships litters the waters, an ill omen indeed.

rooms.name: The source of the Euphrates
rooms.description:
You stand at the headwaters for the Euphrates. A dirty dry
wind blows across what is left of the once mighty river. Now all 
you see are occasional puddles of bloody water. There is a vial 
floating in the largest puddle of blood.

extra_descriptions.description:
The 3rd vial of wrath: rivers and fountains to blood.
The 6th vial of wrath: Drying of Euphrates.

You scoop out the vial. 
Actually there are two vials.
There is some lettering on them.

blood. A terrible wind blows from down stream, bringing the smell

flow. All that is left of the once mighty river are scattered red pools of 
blood. A terrible wind blows from down stream, bringing the smell
of death to your nose.

rooms.name: The Euphrates at the Bridge
rooms.description:
You stand at a bridge crossing the canyon
that used to be the river Euphrates. Steps are carved
into the wall leading up to the bridge and down
to the canyon. From the bridge you may go north
and south into the plain of Armageddon, or you
may follow The Euphrates east and west.

rooms.name: The Euphrates
rooms.description:
You walk the bottom of the canyon where the Euphrates used to
flow. All that is left of the once mighty river are scattered red pools of 
blood. A terrible wind blows from down stream, bringing the smell
of death to your nose.

rooms.description:

stars fall earthward to land with  resounding explosions. The 
smoke is thick. You hear the wail, and smell the seared flesh
of the dying from all around you.

rooms.name: Wormwood
rooms.description:
You are in the heart of Wormwood, where the flames are most
intense. A giant star lies on the ground here, glowing a hateful
red. All of the brush nearby has been blasted flat. A young boy
stands staring at the star. You ask him what happened, and he
says that an angel came, sounded a horn, and the star fell from
the sky. He was told that someone would come by the 5th horn to
get the key of david to unlock the pit.

rooms.name: Wormwood
rooms.description:

smoke is thick. You hear the wail, and smell the seared flesh
of the dying from all around you.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: The shaking lands
rooms.description:
Around you the earth moves violently. Mile deep fissures open and
close like giant mouthes trying to bite you. It is all you can
do to make headway on all fours.

rooms.name: The shaking lands
rooms.description:
Around you the earth moves violently. Mile deep fissures open and
close like giant mouthes trying to bite you. It is all you can
do to make headway on all fours.

rooms.name: The shaking lands
rooms.description:
Around you the earth moves violently. Mile deep fissures open and
close like giant mouthes trying to bite you. It is all you can
do to make headway on all fours.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: Gog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city, Gog. Around you the marked ones 
teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city. On the ground you see a girl worshipping
a devil idol.

rooms.name: Gog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city, Gog. Around you the marked ones 
teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city.

rooms.name: Gog
rooms.description:
You are at the gates to Satan's city, Gog. Around you the marked ones 
teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city.

rooms.name: Gog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city, Gog. Around you the marked ones 
teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city. Here you witness a sorcerer draining the
blood of a boy for a spell component.

rooms.name: Gog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city, Gog. Around you the marked ones 
teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city. A discarded vial lies here.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: The heavens
rooms.description:
You fight the strong buffeting wind of a raging thunderstorm
as you fly upwards into the sky. About you lightning arcs in
great sizzling bolts, followed by the deafening boom of thunder.
Rain beats hard against your face, making it difficult to see.

great sizzling bolts, followed by the deafening boom of thunder.
Rain beats hard against your face, making it difficult to see.

extra_descriptions.description: First vial of Divine wrath: the pox.

rooms.name: Gog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city, Gog. Around you the marked ones 
teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city. Here you see a rich merchant besotted with
wine.

teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: The heavens
rooms.description:
You fight the strong buffeting wind of a raging thunderstorm
as you fly upwards into the sky. About you lightning arcs in
great sizzling bolts, followed by the deafening boom of thunder.
Rain beats hard against your face, making it difficult to see.

rooms.name: The heavens
rooms.description:
You fight the strong buffeting wind of a raging thunderstorm
as you fly upwards into the sky. About you lightning arcs in
great sizzling bolts, followed by the deafening boom of thunder.
Rain beats hard against your face, making it difficult to see.
Great hail the size of talents pelts you.

rooms.name: The heavens
rooms.description:
You fight the strong buffeting wind of a raging thunderstorm
as you fly upwards into the sky. About you lightning arcs in
great sizzling bolts, followed by the deafening boom of thunder.
Rain beats hard against your face, making it difficult to see.

rooms.name: The corner of the world
rooms.description:
You stand at the corner of the world. As any alchemist will
tell you, the world has 4 corners, one devoted to each element, and
held in place by angels. You are at the earth corner. Beyond the
corner stretches the infinite black nothing.

rooms.name: The shaking lands
rooms.description:
Around you the earth moves violently. Mile deep fissures open and
close like giant mouthes trying to bite you. It is all you can
do to make headway on all fours.

rooms.name: The shaking lands
rooms.description:
Around you the earth moves violently. Mile deep fissures open and
close like giant mouthes trying to bite you. It is all you can
do to make headway on all fours.

rooms.name: Armageddon
rooms.description:
You stand in the vast plain of Armageddon. About you angels
sound trumpets and cut through sinners with sickles. The sun
has been swallowed by blackness, and the blood red light of
the moon flickers across the battlefield.

rooms.name: Gog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city, Gog. Around you the marked ones 
teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city.

rooms.name: Gog
rooms.description:
You are in Satan's city, Gog. Around you the marked ones 
teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city.

rooms.name: The unholy shrine
rooms.description:
You have entered the unholy shrine erected at the
dragons decree to the beast. Murals on the walls depict
the miracle where the beast's head healed after a severe
sword wound. There is a giant mound of offerings near
the throne where the beast rests.

rooms.name: Gog

teem and chant the idealogy of the beast. They seem oblivious
to your presence. An unholy shrine towers above all in the
center of the city.

rooms.description:
You fight the strong buffeting wind of a raging thunderstorm
as you fly upwards into the sky. About you lightning arcs in
great sizzling bolts, followed by the deafening boom of thunder.

rooms.name: The heavens
rooms.description:
You fight the strong buffeting wind of a raging thunderstorm
as you fly upwards into the sky. About you lightning arcs in
great sizzling bolts, followed by the deafening boom of thunder.
Rain beats hard against your face, making it difficult to see.

rooms.name: The corner of the world
rooms.description:
You have flown to the corner of the sky. Here the wind is
is somewhat calmer than the rest of the heavens. Beyond the 
corner is the infinite nothing. You feel at peace here. As you
relax you hear the 7th horn and a SIGHT unfolds before your eyes.
Floating in the wind is a vial.

extra_descriptions.description:
You look skyward, and see the temple of God opening.
You can see in his temple the ark of his testament.
The temple of New Jerusalem desends earthward.
The 7th vial of wrath: lightnings, thunders and hail.

rooms.name: The bottomless pit
rooms.description: You fall, forever downwards into the bottomless pit.

exits.description: Falling further into the black pit

rooms.name: In the throne room
rooms.description:
You stand in a magnificant throne room. Multitudes and multitudes
of angles are here singing praise to the one who sits on the throne.
About you are the souls of the dead shuffling foward to be judged.

rooms.name: In the throne room
rooms.description:

of angles are here singing praise to the one who sits on the throne.

rooms.description:
You stand in a magnificant throne room. Multitudes and multitudes
of angles are here singing praise to the one who sits on the throne.

rooms.name: At the throne
rooms.description:
You grovel before the throne. He who sits at the throne
tells you 'Now is your time'. With a gesture a black
hole appears at your feet. He motions for you to go into
the hole, and resumes his Judgement.
